comment.author: Bryden
comment.text: Got to be president now surely Hilary can't run if she gets prosecuted

replies.author: Wezley
replies.text: IF anything happens to her, it won't be until after she wins the Presidency (If She wins) she will be indicted and impeached.

replies.author: Dana
replies.text: Under existing law Hillary is disqualified from running! Having classified email on a private server did that.....
